name: ATLAS レジェンドパック
description: Maritime Simulation/Adventure games in the 15th and 16th century race for the New World. Third in the Artdink Legend Pack series. This game is only available in Japanese.
minimum_requirements: OS: Japanese Windows 8（32&64bit）/ 7（32&64bit）/ Vista（32bit） / XP Graphics: DirectX9.0 compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX9.0 compatible sound Additional Notes: Mouse & Keyboard
